mainBoard.name: Skilled Animator
mainBoard.originalText: When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

rulings.text: Effects that modify a creature's power and/or toughness, such as the ones created by Titanic Growth or a +/1+1 counter, will apply to the creature no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for any counters that change its power and/or toughness and effects that switch power and toughness.
If an Equipment becomes an artifact creature, it usually can't be attached to another creature. If it was attached to a creature, it becomes unattached.

If the artifact was already a creature, its base power and toughness will each become 5. This overwrites any previous effects that set the creature's base power and toughness to specific values. Any power- or toughness-setting effects that start to apply after Skilled Animator's ability resolves will overwrite this effect.
Skilled Animator doesn't remove any abilities the target artifact has.
The artifact retains any types, subtypes, or supertypes it has.

The resulting artifact creature will be able to attack on your turn if it's been under your control continuously since the turn began. That is, it doesn't matter how long it's been a creature, just how long it's been on the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Gearseeker Serpent
mainBoard.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
{5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: Once a player has announced that they are casting this spell, no player may take actions to try to change the number of artifacts its controller controls before the spell’s cost is locked in.
Once this creature has been blocked, activating its last ability won’t cause it to become unblocked.

The total cost to cast this spell is locked in before you pay that cost. For example, if you control three artifacts, including one you can sacrifice to add {C}, the total cost of Gearseeker Serpent is {2}{U}{U}. Then you can sacrifice the artifact when you activate mana abilities just before paying the cost.
This card’s first ability can’t reduce the total cost to cast the spell below {U}{U}.

foreignData.text: Ziehe zwei Karten. Falls du kein Artefakt kontrollierst, wirf eine Karte ab.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli artefici di Kaladesh aspirano incessantemente alla perfezione, al progresso e all'espressione suprema dell'eleganza.
foreignData.name: Rivelazione dell'Artefice
foreignData.text: Pesca due carte. Se non controlli artefatti, scarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: カラデシュの工匠たちは進歩と完璧さ、そして究極の優雅さの表現を求めて絶え間ない努力を惜しまない。
foreignData.name: 工匠の天啓
foreignData.text: カード２枚を引く。あなたがアーティファクトをコントロールしていないなら、カード１枚を捨てる。

foreignData.flavorText: Los artífices de Kaladesh buscan sin descanso la perfección, el progreso y la expresión definitiva de la elegancia.
foreignData.name: Epifanía del artífice
foreignData.text: Roba dos cartas. Si no controlas ningún artefacto, descarta una carta.

mainBoard.name: Artificer's Epiphany
mainBoard.originalText: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

rulings.text: If you control at least one artifact as Artificer’s Epiphany resolves, you can’t discard a card, even if you want to.

mainBoard.text: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

foreignData.name: 时空图集
foreignData.text:
时空图集须横置进战场。
当时空图集进战场时，你可以检视你牌库顶的四张牌。若你如此作，则展示其中至多一张地牌，然后将该牌置于你的牌库顶，其余则以随机顺序置于你牌库底。
{T}：加{C}。

foreignData.name: Atlas planaire
foreignData.text:
L'Atlas planaire arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Quand l'Atlas planaire arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez regarder les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Si vous faites ainsi, révélez jusqu'à une carte de terrain parmi elles, puis mettez cette carte au-dessus de votre bibliothèque et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.

foreignData.name: Atlas der Welten
foreignData.text:
Der Atlas der Welten kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Wenn der Atlas der Welten ins Spiel kommt, kannst du dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek anschauen. Falls du dies tust, zeige davon bis zu eine Länderkarte offen vor, lege sie oben auf deine Bibliothek und den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter die Bibliothek.
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.

foreignData.name: Atlante Planare
foreignData.text:
L'Atlante Planare entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
Quando l'Atlante Planare entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi guardare le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Se lo fai, rivela fino a una carta terra scelta tra esse, poi metti quella carta in cima al tuo grimorio e le altre in fondo in ordine casuale.
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.

foreignData.name: 次元の大地図
foreignData.text:
次元の大地図はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
次元の大地図が戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード４枚を見てもよい。そうしたなら、その中から土地・カード最大１枚を公開し、そのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に、残りを一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
{T}：{C}を加える。

foreignData.name: Atlas planar
foreignData.text:
El Atlas planar entra al campo de batalla girado.
Cuando el Atlas planar entre al campo de batalla, puedes mirar las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Si lo haces, muestra hasta una carta de tierra de entre ellas, luego pon esa carta en la parte superior de tu biblioteca y el resto en el fondo en un orden aleatorio.
{T}: Agrega {C}.

mainBoard.name: Planar Atlas
mainBoard.originalText:
Planar Atlas enters the battlefield tapped.
When Planar Atlas enters the battlefield, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order.
{T}: Add {C}.
mainBoard.text:
This artifact enters tapped.
When this artifact enters, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order.
{T}: Add {C}.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Release that which was never caged."
—Spellbomb inscription

foreignData.flavorText:
「释放，从未禁锢。」
～咒击弹铭文
foreignData.name: 乙太咒击弹
foreignData.text:
{U}，牺牲乙太咒击弹：将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
{1}，牺牲乙太咒击弹：抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText:
« Libère ce qui jamais n'a été mis en cage. »
—Inscription sur une bombe à sortilèges
foreignData.name: Bombe à sortilèges d'Éther
foreignData.text:
{U}, sacrifiez la Bombe à sortilèges d'Éther : Renvoyez une créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
{1}, sacrifiez la Bombe à sortilèges d'Éther : Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Das freizulassen, was nie eingesperrt war."
—Gravur der Spruchbombe
foreignData.name: Äther-Spruchbombe
foreignData.text:
{U}, opfere die Äther-Spruchbombe: Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
{1}, opfere die Äther-Spruchbombe: Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Libera ciò che non è mai stato in gabbia."
—Iscrizione della Bombarcana
foreignData.name: Bombarcana Eterea
foreignData.text:
{U}, Sacrifica la Bombarcana Eterea: Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
{1}, Sacrifica la Bombarcana Eterea: Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「檻に入れられざる物を解き放て。」
――呪文爆弾の銘文
foreignData.name: 上天の呪文爆弾
foreignData.text:
{U},上天の呪文爆弾を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
{1},上天の呪文爆弾を生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Libera lo que nunca estuvo enjaulado".
—Inscripción en la bombahechizo
foreignData.name: Bombahechizo de éter
foreignData.text:
{U}, sacrificar la Bombahechizo de éter: Regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
{1}, sacrificar la Bombahechizo de éter: Roba una carta.

mainBoard.name: Aether Spellbomb
mainBoard.originalText:
{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.
mainBoard.text:
{U}, Sacrifice this artifact: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

foreignData.flavorText: 于精妙微观世界中，尽览自然伟大奇迹。
foreignData.name: 兴旺岛屿
foreignData.text:
兴旺岛屿须横置进战场。
于兴旺岛屿进战场时，选择一种蓝色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{U}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

foreignData.flavorText: Toutes les merveilles de la nature dans un microcosme à couper le souffle.
foreignData.name: Île prospère
foreignData.text:
L'Île prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
Au moment où l'Île prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le bleu.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Alle Wunder der natürlichen Welt in einem einzigen atemberaubenden Mikrokosmos.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Insel
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Insel kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Insel ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Tutte le meraviglie della natura in un microcosmo mozzafiato.
foreignData.name: Isola Florida
foreignData.text:
L'Isola Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre l'Isola Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal blu.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然界のあらゆる驚異がこの美しく小さな世界に詰まっている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する島嶼
foreignData.text:
興隆する島嶼はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する島嶼が戦場に出るに際し、青でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{U}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.
foreignData.name: Islote floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Islote floreciente entra al campo de batalla girada.
En cuanto el Islote floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea azul.
{T}: Agrega {U} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
